name: Foodbuddy light: Pizza #002
description: Foodbuddies are creation which are based on different kind of food in the world! Every foodbuddy will be a unique character with their own emotion, facial hair, hats, items and other accessories. All creations are hand made pixel by pixel. Different foods will be made in the following category: Fruit, Vegetable, Fastfood, Drink and Candy. This edition is a light version of the foodbuddies edition. The light version is created in a 48x48 pixels scaled up to 480x480 pixels. The light version is simpler compared to the full version with the foodbuddy having just one extra accessoires and a standard background.
